bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.1 Operating System / Platform => Any Compiler => Any
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
There is an erroneous in the explanation of parameters for returnPoints that is written as
When the output array is std::vector, the flag is ignored, and the output depends on the type of the vector: std::vector implies returnPoints=true, std::vector implies returnPoints=false
The true/false value is written oppositely. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
see <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/3.1.0/d3/dc0/group__imgproc__shape.html#ga014b28e56cb8854c0de4a211cb2be656>here</denchmark-link>
